Html: Would someone point me on the right track to be able to navigate to another page with code.

it's very simply,just use the code(.net 4.5):

NavigationCommands.GoToPage.Execute("your xaml uri", Application.Current.MainWindow/other embed window);
but it use Application.LoadComponent(uri)(DefaultContentLoader.cs),so first time may be you will has a new usercontrol class instance...

if you use .net 4,you should reference the shell library.
